# F0 = ALL_Mapped / min(ALL_Mapped)
# Spike_Norm  = Spikein_Mapped / F0
# Target_Norm = Target_Mapped  / F0
# ALL_Norm    = ALL_Mapped     / F0
# F1 = min(Spikein_Mapped) / Spikein_Mapped 
# F2 = 1 / F0 * F1 
# F3 = min( Spikein_Norm) / Spikein_Norm
# F4 = 1 / F0 * F3
Sample	Spike	Target	ALL	F0	Spikein_Norm	Target_Norm	ALL_Norm	F1	F2	F3	F4
NC_1	4165657	15361208	19526865	1.4921	2791808.19	10295025.80	13086914	0.5637	0.3778	0.8127	0.5447
NC_2	3753537	12121573	15875110	1.2131	3094169.48	9992229.00	13086914	0.6256	0.5157	0.7333	0.6045
PARP1_1	4652827	14347168	18999995	1.4518	3204867.75	9882330.90	13086914	0.5047	0.3476	0.7080	0.4876
PARP1_2	3585646	13066181	16651827	1.2724	2818017.92	10268925.65	13086914	0.6549	0.5147	0.8051	0.6328
TFDP1_1	2909301	10177613	13086914	1.0000	2909301.00	10177613.00	13086914	0.8072	0.8072	0.7799	0.7799
